subject: Improve mobile responsiveness with enhanced touch targets
body:
Mobile improvements:
- Add comprehensive mobile styles for screens ≤800px
- Implement 44px minimum touch targets for all interactive elements
- Set font-size: 16px on inputs to prevent iOS zoom
- Increase slider thumb size to 24px for easier touch
- Increase checkbox touch area to 44x44px
- Improve button touch targets (min 48px height)
- Switch preset buttons to 2-column layout on mobile
- Adjust spacing and padding for mobile screens
- Add extra small device support (≤480px)
- Optimize visualization container for mobile viewports
- Remove border-right on mobile sidebar, add border-bottom
- Allow body height to be auto on mobile for better scrolling
